Tophat Themes

Stylish, open-source themes for Bootstrap

Bootstrap v4.3.1

Follow Star

Don't want that typical Bootstrap look? These free themes provide an additional lightweight style-layer to give your standard Bootstrap 4 site a unique, custom look-and-feel.

Wandoo

Graymor

Lymcha

Deeply

Mickie

Electro

Hollar

Minco

Skeeblu

Preptor

Monotone

Sunset

Usage

Simply download the theme.css file for any theme, and include it after the standard bootstrap.css in your project's HTML templates. The SASS source is also available in theme.scss, to make further customizations easier. Each theme also includes example layout templates to demonstrate Bootstrap 4 elements, components, and content integration.

Looking for more Bootstrap 4 themes & tools?
